adHeader: Student Tutoring by Monta Vista Students
adDetails: We are a group of students from Monta Vista who will be tutoring this summer for $15/hour. We offer competition mathematics, school math, and physics as our core subjects, and we have had previous tutoring experience. We can also provide other lessons based on demand. Our competition math tutor's experience includes: USAJMO Qualifier, 141 AMC 10, 23 AMC 8, A3 Team ARML, Honorable Mention BAMO, and Semi-finals Physics Olympiad among others. Our first Physics/Math Tutor has a 2330 SAT I, 800 SAT II Math, 800 SAT II Biology and has taken physics honors at Monta Vista with an A grade. Our second Physics/Math tutor passed Physics honors with a 98-99% overall grade and has taken math courses up to Precalculus honors. If you would like to be added to an email list please fill out this google form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1Dd9xlKoUMwzY4Vl6kmpX9RCCmgEzvEUZG6mv_j7V3Xw/viewform?usp=send_form Please send any questions to show contact info
